hero.title: Inner Ascend
hero.subtitle: Open the Gates of Remembrance
hero.features: A ceremonial passage into truth, held with lineage, trauma-informed care, and deep presence.
hero.disclaimer: By application only—for those who feel the call.

whatIsBufo.title: The Sacred Medicine
whatIsBufo.subtitle: Return to what you've always been
whatIsBufo.intro: The most potent and profound entheogenic compound on Earth
whatIsBufo.paragraph1: 5-MeO-DMT is the only substance that can reliably introduce individuals to a state of full non-dual awareness, override the energetic structure of the ego, and reveal the unitary nature of reality. The medicine we work with is natural Bufo secretion, obtained through non-harmful, ethical, and lineage-guided methods by trained specialists in the Sonoran Desert. The toads are not harmed.
whatIsBufo.paragraph2: This is not a psychedelic. It is a sacred teacher of dissolution and pure remembrance. The effects begin within
whatIsBufo.paragraph2Cont: of inhalation. Despite its intensity, the passage is held in complete safety, grounding, and expert guidance. Complete ego dissolution. Non-dual consciousness. The remembrance of what you've always been.
whatIsBufo.quote: This work is by application only. If you are here, you were directed intentionally—guided, invited, or called. This medicine is not for everyone, and it is not a shortcut. This path requires humility, surrender, and integration.

experience.title: The Experience
experience.speedValue: Effects begin within seconds of inhalation
experience.intensityValue: Complete ego dissolution and non-dual consciousness
experience.outcomeValue: The remembrance of what you've always been

whoThisIsFor.title: This Medicine Is For...
whoThisIsFor.subtitle: (And who it's not for)
forList: Those who've done deep inner work and feel called to complete something
Those seeking dissolution of illusion, not an experience
Those ready to surrender and integrate
Those who can no longer pretend
notForList: Those with untreated trauma or psychosis
whoThisIsFor.quote: You're not broken. You're not lost. You're initiating.

threePhaseJourney.title: The Three-Phase Journey
threePhaseJourney.description: Sacred medicine work requires preparation, presence, and integration. This is not a shortcut. This is the work of a lifetime.

preparation.title: Preparation
preparation.description: Open the field. Anchor the nervous system. Begin with clarity.

ceremony.title: Ceremony
ceremony.description: A sacred passage into remembrance. Held with lineage, trauma-informed care, and full presence. Includes one integration session.

integration.title: Integration
integration.description: Insight becomes embodiment. Anchoring remembrance into daily life. One session included with ceremony.

threePhaseJourney.quote:
Insight without integration is just spiritual entertainment.
This isn't a quick fix. This isn't a weekend workshop.
This is the work of a lifetime—compressed into the time your soul needs.

facilitators.title: Nina & Astral
facilitators.subtitle: Initiated by Seri Tribe Elders in the Sonoran Desert, Mexico
facilitators.paragraph1: This path shaped us before we ever held space for others. We know the terrain from the inside. This work is held with deep reverence for the indigenous lineage from which it comes. Nina and Astral have been initiated as daughter and son of the Seri Tribe by elders in the desert of Sonora, Mexico.
facilitators.paragraph2: The medicine is received in a respectful, traditional way by specialists, in alignment with the Seri lineage we have been initiated into. The toad is never harmed. Years of training in trauma-informed approaches, energy healing, and the sacred art of holding space for ego dissolution. Guest speakers in facilitator training programs. Hundreds of ceremonies guided with safety, presence, and deep respect.
facilitators.quote: We have sat with the medicine. We have dissolved, returned, and broken open again. We hold this work with reverence. If you feel called, let's walk slowly. This is sacred territory—not a service.

location.title: Location
location.description: A sacred container in nature, held with deep reverence

timeline.title: Timeline
timeline.includes: Includes opening prayer, ceremony, and post-ceremony rest

whatsIncluded.item5: Full day of care and post-ceremony rest

there is no death.

medical.title: Medical Screening Required
medical.description: Safety is paramount. All participants must complete a thorough health questionnaire and medical screening before ceremony. Though the experience is profound, you are held in complete safety, grounding, and presence throughout the entire passage.

contraindications.title: Contraindications
contraindications.item5: Severe unresolved trauma without therapeutic support

disclaimer.title: Ceremonial & Legal Notice:
disclaimer.text: All work is ceremonial, educational, and rooted in indigenous spiritual traditions. We do not provide medical treatment or clinical psychedelic services. All references to Bufo Alvarius refer to traditional ceremonial practices. We do not claim to diagnose, treat, or cure any condition. If you have any medical conditions, please consult with your healthcare provider before applying.

ethics.title: Our Ethics
ethics.item1: Natural Bufo secretion obtained ethically—toads never harmed. We honor the desert, the lineage, and the beings who carry this medicine.
ethics.item3: Deep respect for Seri lineage and traditions

items.question: What is Bufo Alvarius / 5-MeO-DMT?
items.answer: Bufo Alvarius is 5-MeO-DMT extracted from the Sonoran Desert Toad. It is the most potent entheogenic compound on Earth, capable of inducing complete ego dissolution and non-dual consciousness within seconds. This is not a psychedelic in the traditional sense—it's a sacred teacher of death and pure remembrance. The experience is brief (15-30 minutes) but profoundly transformative.

items.question: Is Bufo safe?
items.answer: When held in proper ceremony by trained facilitators with thorough medical screening, Bufo is physiologically safe for most people. However, it is psychologically and spiritually intense. Safety requires: (1) Medical screening to rule out contraindications, (2) Trauma-informed facilitation, (3) Integration support. This is why ceremony is only offered after discernment—never sold directly.

items.question: What are the contraindications?
items.answer: Bufo is contraindicated for those with: heart conditions, high blood pressure, psychosis or schizophrenia, epilepsy, pregnancy/breastfeeding, active use of SSRIs or MAOIs, recent surgery, severe unprocessed trauma without therapeutic support, and active substance abuse. This is why medical screening is mandatory.

items.question: Do I need preparation sessions?
items.answer: Preparation sessions are optional but highly recommended, especially for first-time participants. They help anchor your nervous system, assess emotional readiness, and create a sacred container for the experience. However, medical screening and mutual discernment are required for everyone.

items.question: Is integration included?
items.answer: Yes! One integration session within 48 hours is included with every ceremony. Additional integration sessions are available for those who want deeper support anchoring the insights into daily life.

items.question: How do I know if this is right for me?
items.answer: You'll know. If you've read this far and something inside you says 'yes'—that's your signal. If you're curious but terrified, that's normal. If you're seeking a quick fix or peak experience, this isn't for you. If you're ready to surrender everything, to face truth without bypassing—then reach out. The discernment process will clarify readiness for both of us.

contact.title: Begin Your Application
contact.quote: This work is never sold. Only offered.
contact.readyDescription: Start by completing the medical screening. This helps us understand if this work is right for you.
contact.closing: Walk slowly. If this is your path, you'll know.

footer.description: Sacred Bufo Alvarius ceremonies held with lineage, trauma-informed care, and deep presence in Mazunte, Oaxaca, Mexico.
footer.disclaimer: All work is ceremonial, educational, and rooted in indigenous spiritual traditions. We do not provide medical treatment or clinical psychedelic services.
